DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety pitavastatin atorvastatin patient type II diabetes mellitus ( type II DM ) combine dyslipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Pitavastatin Atorvastatin Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus Combined Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Males female ( age 1875 year ) Type II DM treat oral antidiabetic medication ( sulfonylurea , metformin , glitazones , combination therapy ) Must follow restrictive diet Diagnosis combine dyslipidemia Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Conditions may cause secondary dyslipidemia Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus Abnormal pancreatic , liver , renal function Abnormal serum creatine kinase ( CK ) prespecified level Significant heart disease
